ValidationRule.description: Prevents hardware discount on CM31/32 AI dash cameras
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type, "Revenue Opportunity"), CONTAINS(Product2.ProductCode,"HW-CM3"), Opportunity.of_LIC_Products__c = 0, Discount <> 0, OpportunityId <> '0061P00000SxENa'
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Discounts Are Not Permitted on CM31 or CM32 AI Dashboard Camera Upgrades. A License Must Be Added.
